remarks: Domain of an operation given by the "maps to" notation, closed form of ~ dmmpt2 .  Caution:  This theorem is only valid in the very special case where the value of the mapping is a constant!  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jun-2017.)  (Prove shortened by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)
statement:
dmmpt2g.f $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
dmmpt2g $p |- ( C e. V -> dom F = ( A X. B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d V x y $.
